alert.note: Alert for Heard; Troup (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 30 at 3:46AM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Heard, northern Troup and southwestern Coweta Counties through 415 AM EST... At 346 AM EST, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from near Centralhatchee to Crystal Lake, and moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... LaGrange, Franklin, Hogansville, Grantville, Moreland, Corinth, State Line Park, Abbottsford, Waresville, Frolona, Texas, Harrisonville, Hillcrest, Wares Crossroads and Glenn. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
